subject: Re: Is there an easier way to  add TestSuites of classes from package?
msgSnippet: wow thanks, it was easy and it worked! you just saved me hours and hours -nelson
messageBody:
wow thanks, it was easy and it worked!

you just saved me hours and hours

-nelson

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Vladimir R. Bossicard" <vladimir@b...>
wrote:
> > Is there a more automated way JUnit can traverse through a package
> > tree, and find all the classes that implement suite(), and
> > automatically call them for me?
>
> junit-addons: DirectorySuiteBuilder
>
> <http://junit-addons.sf.net>
>
> -Vladimir
>
> --
> Vladimir R. Bossicard
> www.bossicard.com
